Reviews.Title: Mine works great!
Reviews.Author: Marcus T. Brody
Reviews.Content: I think some of these negative reviewers have an agenda.  I have had NO problems whatsoever with this laptop. Had it over 6 months, and it still works like a charm.  This isn't a top of the line laptop, so I didn't expect dynamic performance. It is what it is.  Nice, basic laptop, decent speed, decent overall performance.  You want a blazing fast computer with all of the bells and whistles, $300-400 is the wrong price range to be looking at.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, horrible touchpad
Reviews.Author: NiuHuskieFan
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good laptop.  It runs cooler than any laptop I've owned and the battery life is decent.  The only thing I can't stand is the touch pad.  The texture is awful, responsiveness is awful, it's too easy to brush while typing, and just totally unpredictable.  I use a wireless mouse and wish I could disable the touch pad altogether.

Reviews.Title: when you updte ur ram to 8GB. Perfect computer!!!!
Reviews.Author: Duke
Reviews.Content: I got this at 350(included tax). it was just soso for me because it originally only has 4GB RAM and always made this computer lag.However, when it update to 8gb(I added another 4GB ram by 35 dollars). wow it is amazing, I can open 20 web tags without lag. this computer is enough for business and studying.Don't hope it can use to play big excellent computer game!! I have to turn off majority of  visual effects when I paly lol on a extent 20 inch monitor.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Lady K 2013 "Kat"
Reviews.Content: I went to a class and my classmate had this laptop.  I am pleased with my purchase!! thank you Lenovo and Amazon

Reviews.Title: lenovo ideapad N580
Reviews.Author: patrick fales
Reviews.Content: machine advertised as 500GB, delivered as 320GB, otherwise fine.  nice machine, met all expectations.  vendor made concessions for different hard drive.

Reviews.Title: Solid computer/ Gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: ted
Reviews.Content: I got this item for my uncle, the only thing that he will use if for is surfing the internet, and a few other light applications such as storing photos.

Reviews.Title: Missing my hard drive
Reviews.Author: lunasea
Reviews.Content: advertised as 500 gb. It came with less than 300 gb partitioned 250 +25. Not happy about that. Everything else was fine and would give it 5 stars for the money, othwerwise.-----------------------------------------update _ the company never addressed my problem but amazon did! They gave me an external hard drive to make up for it. I am now completely happy and the lap top is really great for the price

Reviews.Title: Worst computer ever!
Reviews.Author: MaryDD38
Reviews.Content: I bought mine at Best Buy and I have to say it's the worst laptop ever! 3 months after I got it, it started turning off by itself and getting really hot even if we cleaned its vents.We sent it to Lenovo company,BTW we had to pay for sending it, aprox. $45, and as soon as it got home we noticed that it was poorly assembled and every time we turned it on it would stay on a black screen and it said something about a cable not being connected, in white letters, then it would start working. A month later, it started acting up and sometimes it just freezes or it stays 'thinking' or 'loading' when you turn it on. We end up taking the battery out and putting it back in so it starts working. And the cd/dvd player stopped working and I'm sure it was because of how the company handled it when we sent it for them to 'repair' it!!! It still doesn't have a year with us, and this happened after just 3 months of buying it! Don't waste money on any computer by Lenovo, their service and support sucks!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time
Reviews.Author: Rosho
Reviews.Content: I've had nothing but issues with this. Even when it WAS working, it was a subpar computer that can't handle Windows 8 very well.After 2 months of casually using it for work, it wouldn't load the operating system. The computer is nothing more than a paperweight and Lenovo support is worthless.

Reviews.Title: Worst Purchase I ever made!!! Don't buy this!!.
Reviews.Author: Jean s Mueller
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I didn't just purchase one if these, I got two, one for me and one for my daughter. Both of us hate this computer equally. I thought it would be a cheap way to get introduced to Windows 8. The most annoying thing about it is when you're trying to type e-mails etc, it jumps all over the place and suddenly you're typing in the middle of a line you already finished, so you have to delete it from the wrong line and reenter it in the correct place. Windows 8 was definitely made for touch screen which this computer definitely is not. Save yourself the money and annoyance and stay away from this product
